code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./AddItemForm.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AddItemForm(_ref){let{addItem}=_ref;const[inputValue,setInputValue]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(inputValue){addItem(inputValue);setInputValue('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"add-item-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:inputValue,onChange:e=>setInputValue(e.target.value),className:"input-box"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"add-button",children:"Add Item"})]});}export default AddItemForm;
